mapper.select: SELECT bcc.board_idx ,subject ,appoint_place ,member_id ,min_delivery ,write_date ,deadline ,hit ,member_cnt ,recruit_end FROM board_common_column bcc, delivery_board d WHERE bcc.board_idx = d.board_idx AND category_id = '배달게시판' ORDER BY bcc.board_idx DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board_common_column SET hit = hit+1 WHERE board_idx = #{board_idx}
